name: Trapped in Funland - A Minecraft Quest
name_original: Trapped in Funland - A Minecraft Quest
description:
You arrive at a dream island, a place to have fun and enjoy yourself, like an amusement park. What could possibly go wrong? Nothing! As long as you don't mind the dark secret behind this land. Will you be able to escape from Funland?

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
